posts.post_content: Hi all. I have decided to go with SGC graded cards only, so I have this beautiful PSA 5 Billy Sullivan I would like to trade for a SGC 60 of the same. I just don't want to take the time and added expense of having it crossed over. I would also trade for a SGC 50 if I can get one with an Old Mill back. The other scan shows 2 cards I can offer in trade to sweeten the deal for the OM version. Let me know what you have.

Tony

I checked SGC's population report. Just so you know, they have only ever graded one Sullivan with an Old Mill back. Ironically it was graded a 50. 

Hope this helps

Jantz
Thanks for the info. Also, the Downs was sold on an offer from a member. The Schreckengost is available for $50 + $3 s&h if anyone is interested.
